name: Don't Cream in Between
description:
Game is most compatible in full screen mode.

The object of the game is to escape the cream filling (giant maze) before the large Oreo cookies crush you. It may take a few tries to learn the routes because the cookies are relentlessly fast. Good luck!

Controls  --------------------

-W,A,S,D: move the player

-mouse movement: move the camera

-spacebar: jump

-escape: bring up the pause menu

Key Items --------------------

Green box: increase player speed

Red box: decrease player speed

Brown box: make the walls invisible

Teleporters: blue (exit), green (to), yellow (from)

Fun Facts --------------------

"Don't Cream in Between" is an intense maze challenge designed and built in 36 hours for Texas Game Jam 2021. 

Game Developers: Dylan, Michael, and Abhi

Original soundtrack by: Abhi and Michael
